alert.note: Alert for Routt (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 24 at 2:36PM MDT until May 28 at 12:48PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Colorado... Elk River at Milner affecting Routt County. .Warm temperatures will continue to melt snowpack and increase river and stream flows. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Elk River at Milner. * WHEN...Until early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, water is nearing ranch buildings between County Road 44 and the Elk River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM MDT Wednesday the stage was 7.2 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 7.8 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 7.5 feet. - Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
